item.title: Forget AirPods Max, Beats Solo 4 Bluetooth Headphones Crash to a Record Low After 10K+ Units Sold
item.content:encoded:
Want a new pair of wireless headphones? One of our favorite picks by far is the Beats Solo 4. They have great sound, are extremely comfortable; and are easy to control and pair with your devices. Plus, since they’re on sale, they’re far more enticing right now at a lower price.

For a limited time, you can get the Beats Solo 4 on-ear wireless headphones on Amazon for only $129.95 (down from their normal retail price of $200), a savings of $70.05 and 35% off.

See at Amazon

Comfortable, stylish headphones with fantastic audio

Immediately upon trying on the Beats Solo 4, you’ll recognize how comfortable they feel due to their lightweight design and soft padded ear cups. The ear cups don’t press against your ears as they would be squeezed by a lot of other headphones and this makes listening for extended periods of time less tiring and a lot easier.

The sound quality delivered by the Beats Solo 4 is fun and dynamic. The Bass is deep and punches, the Midrange is clear and defined and the Treble remains bright and crisp even when turned up high. With this well-balanced sound, the Beats Solo 4 headphones are capable of reproducing a variety of musical styles including energetic Pop and Hip Hop, Acoustic/Indie music and many others. The Solo 4’s ability to reproduce detailed audio provides an enjoyable listening experience that sounds full and rich.

Connecting your Beats Solo 4 wireless headphones to your smartphone, tablet or computer is quick and easy using the headphones’ built-in Bluetooth technology and stable connection. This gives you freedom to move around without being tied down to a cord or dealing with lost signal issues. Additionally, the Solo 4’s earcup contains controls that allow you to adjust volume, play/pause songs and answer/hang up calls without having to touch your device, providing you with a very portable and convenient option for on-the-go listening.

The Beats Solo 4’s battery life is also quite good for wireless on-ear headphones and should give you plenty of time to listen to your favorite content for hours before needing a charge. In addition, once the battery is depleted, they recharge quickly, so you won’t need to spend too much time waiting for them to be ready again.

Overall, the Beats Solo 4 are a great choice for everyday listening. They give you reliable connectivity if you’re on the iOS ecosystem, they fit well, and they’re comfortable to wear for long periods of time. If it matters to you, they’re also very stylish. Grab a pair while you still can now that the holidays are drawing to a close.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/forget-airpods-max-beats-solo-4-bluetooth-headphones-crash-to-a-record-low-after-10k-units-sold-2000655752

item.title: Samsung Clears Out Galaxy Tab A9+ at All-Time Low, Now the Budget Tablet Alternative to Apple iPad
item.content:encoded:
There are tons of tablets on the market, but only a handful of great ones that you’ll want to bring home immediately. We’ve found one in particular that’s a great candidate to add to your arsenal: the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+.

If you’d rather get one without having to pay full price, you can do that right now by buying at Amazon. There, it’s just $139.99 instead of its normal retail price of $220.00. That’s a savings of $80.01 and a discount of approximately 36%.

See at Amazon

A workhorse of a tablet perfect for your everyday needs

When you’re in a situation where you don’t want to get a new laptop, but you still need something that can perform, this is the type of tablet you should seek out. And what’s more, it can do just about anything you may need it to do.

This tablet has a fantastic, crisp screen with vivid colors that wraps around the edges of the tablet. It makes everything look a little brighter and better, and those small touches really do matter. And speaking of touch, the touchscreen is quick and responsive, so you can navigate through apps and read content without a hitch. The size of the Galaxy Tab A9+ makes it a great candidate for giving you an immersive viewing experience while still being small enough to be held comfortably in one hand or easily stored in a backpack for travel.

As far as the hardware goes, the Galaxy Tab A9+ comes equipped with a processor that performs everyday functions efficiently. Switching back and forth between apps, checking email, browsing Facebook, and streaming movies is easy work for this tablet. Sure, it won’t perform like a high-end laptop, but it will meet your needs when it comes to daily usage and function. It’s running Android, providing access to thousands of apps available through the Google Play Store so you can personalize your new piece of tech with all the apps and games you could want.

The battery life of the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ is sufficient to last throughout an entire day of use. Regardless of whether you’re streaming movies, listening to music, or simply reading, you’ll have ample power to get through your day without needing to plug in your charger multiple times.

With its impressive display, excellent performance, and all-day battery life, the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ is an ideal companion for everyday life as a multimedia and productivity tool. Now that it’s on sale for just $139.99 on Amazon (down from $220), it’s a good time to go ahead and lock yours in without having to worry about paying full price.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/samsung-clears-out-galaxy-tab-a9-at-all-time-low-now-the-budget-tablet-alternative-to-apple-ipad-2000655755
